title: Store Containers with Salt to Keep Them Odor Free
description: Do your storage containers have a lingering odor even after you have washed them thoroughly? Just store them with a pinch of salt to keep them odor free!

asset.author: OXO
asset.hookText:
Do your storage containers have a lingering odor even after you have washed them thoroughly? Just store them with a pinch of salt to keep them odor free!

Have any good tips? Share them with us on Twitter and Instagram using the hashtag #OXOGoodTips.
